title: FlixRecs
description: Flix Recs in an A.I. powered movie/show recommendation app, which curates recommendations, based on a given user's search query/Wishlist and watch history. The site also offers movie/show reviews, a global feed, and a news feed for entertainment related news. We also offer dedicated API services for developers, streaming services, and content platforms that are looking to handle complex user queries and integrate smart movie/show recommendations into their applications.
